Texts.Chs: 始终保持输出的信号发射器？或许我可以使门保持在开启的状态？
Texts.Eng: A signal emitter that's always on? Maybe I can use it to keep doors open and switches online at all times?

Texts.Chs: 这是一个信号发射器。它无时无刻不在输出着信号。
Texts.Eng: A signal emitter. Outputs an active signal at all times.

Texts.Chs: 始终保持输出出出的信号发射器？或许叶族人可以使门门门保持在开启的状态？
Texts.Eng: Sssignal emitter that'sss alwaysss on? Maybe Floran can ussse it to keep doorsss open and ssswitchesss online at all timesss?
